text: Mahdi Kadhim (born 1 July 1967) is a former Iraqi football midfielder who played for Iraq in the 1994 FIFA World Cup qualification. He played for the national team between 1992 and 1993. Madhi played 2 matches for Iraq and scored in the 1994 FIFA World Cup qualification against Yemen. http://niiiis.com/players3.html ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
